name: Rocks and Rockets
description: Rocks and Rockets - a terrific action game where you have to control the rocket and to cope with a very hostile environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
